p: The Schrodinger glide docking module was used for virtual screening. In order to get accurate results, the standard precision (SP docking) was selected [ 27, 28]. The output results were ordered by docking score. In this set, the curcumin was found to be a strong inhibitor of SARS Mpro [ 13]. The measured IC50 was 0.0235 μM. The obtained docking results were reanalyzed to include a comparison with curcumin. The relative docking scores were calculated for every compound by dividing its score with the docking score curcumin.
